Ext.namespace("Ext.coo.popular.channel");Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url="coo/channel.do";Ext.coo.popular.channel.extWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{params:{},constructor:function(){this.form=new Ext.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",autoHeight:true,border:false,bodyStyle:"padding:5px;",labelWidth:65,items:[{xtype:"fjs-store-radio",name:"Suffix",fieldLabel:"文件类型",dictId:"system.export.excel",groupcfg:{name:"Suffix"}}]});Ext.coo.popular.channel.extWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-excel",title:"Excel 格式",width:420,autoHeight:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){this.params.action="export";this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:this.params,success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))},apply_success:function(form,opts){Ext.fjs.download("/down.php?filename="+opts.result.message);this.window_close()}});Ext.coo.popular.channel.addWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"coo/channel_add.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"textfield",name:"NEXTSID",readOnly:true},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"TID",width:150,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,allrec:false,dictId:"channel.type"},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NAME",width:400,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:20},{xtype:"textfield",name:"RADDR",width:400,allowBlank:true,boldLabel:true,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"DADDR",width:400,allowBlank:true,boldLabel:true,maxLength:100}]});Ext.coo.popular.channel.addWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-add",title:"推广渠道",width:560,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:false,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-save",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){var f=this.form;if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(f)){f.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:{action:"save"},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()},loader_success:function(res,opts){var rs=opts.result.data;this.show()},open:function(){this.form.getForm().load(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:{action:"getNextSid"},success:this.loader_success,scope:this}))}});Ext.coo.popular.channel.modWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"coo/channel_mod.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"displayfield",name:"SID"},{xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"TID",width:150,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,allrec:false,dictId:"channel.type"},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NAME",width:400,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:20},{xtype:"textfield",name:"RADDR",width:400,allowBlank:true,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"DADDR",width:400,allowBlank:true,boldLabel:true,minLength:2,maxLength:100},{xtype:"textfield",name:"RCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"RNAME",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"BCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NMONEY",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"FCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"SCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"FMONEY",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"SMONEY",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"TZSUM",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"TXSUM",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NASTOCK",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"SSTOCK",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true}]});Ext.coo.popular.channel.modWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-edit",title:"推广渠道",width:560,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:true,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-refresh",text:"更新数据",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){if(Ext.fjs.checkValid(this.form)){this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.saveAction({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:{action:"save",sid:this.sid},success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))}},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()},loader_success:function(res,opts){var rs=opts.result.data;this.show()},open:function(sid){this.sid=sid;this.form.getForm().load(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:{action:"view",sid:sid},success:this.loader_success,scope:this}))}});Ext.coo.popular.channel.sumWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.form.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"coo/channel_sum.tpl"},style:"padding-top:0px",items:[{xtype:"textfield",name:"RCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"RNAME",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"BCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NMONEY",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"FCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"SCOUNT",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"FMONEY",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"SMONEY",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"TZSUM",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"TXSUM",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"NASTOCK",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true},{xtype:"textfield",name:"SSTOCK",width:130,allowBlank:false,boldLabel:true,minLength:1,maxLength:30,readOnly:true}]});Ext.coo.popular.channel.sumWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-edit",title:"查看汇总",width:560,autoHeight:true,autoScroll:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",plain:true,modal:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){},apply_success:function(form,opts){this.form.getForm().reset();this.grid.refresh();this.window_close()},loader_success:function(res,opts){var rs=opts.result.data;this.show()},open:function(){this.form.getForm().load(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:{action:"sum"},success:this.loader_success,scope:this}))}});Ext.coo.popular.channel.MainPanel=Ext.extend(Ext.grid.GridPanel,{constructor:function(){this.addBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-add",text:"增加",tooltip:"增加",disabled:false,handler:this.add_onclick,scope:this});this.modBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-edit",text:"修改",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.mod_onclick,scope:this});this.delBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-delete",text:"删除",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.del_onclick,scope:this});this.sumBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-detail1",text:"查看汇总",tooltip:"渠道汇总数据查看",disabled:false,handler:this.sum_onclick,scope:this});this.btns=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"mnu-wrench_orange",text:"批量操作",menu:[{iconCls:"btn-excel",text:"导出数据",handler:this.export_onclick,scope:this}],disabled:false});var sm=new Ext.grid.CheckboxSelectionModel();var cm=new Ext.grid.ColumnModel([sm,new Ext.grid.RowNumber()<s:header id="coo.popular.channel"/>]);this.store=new Ext.fjs.PageStore({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,baseParams:{action:"list"},fields:[<s:fields id="coo.popular.channel"/>]});this.store.load({params:{start:0,limit:Ext.fjs.defPSize}});Ext.coo.popular.channel.MainPanel.superclass.constructor.call(this,{region:"center",store:this.store,stripeRows:true,autoScroll:true,boldHeader:true,closable:true,containerScroll:true,columnLines:true,cm:cm,sm:sm,loadMask:true,tbar:[this.ftype=new Ext.fjs.form.StoreComboBox({xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"ftype",dictId:"channel.type",allowBlank:true,allrec:true,width:90}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.fstarttime=new Ext.form.DateField({xtype:"datefield",name:"fstarttime",allowBlank:true,width:150,minLength:19,maxLength:19,format:'Y-m-d H:i:s'}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},{xtype:"tbtext",text:"-",width:5},{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.fendtime=new Ext.form.DateField({xtype:"datefield",name:"fendtime",allowBlank:true,width:150,minLength:19,maxLength:19,format:'Y-m-d H:i:s'}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},{iconCls:"btn-search",tooltip:"查询",handler:this.search_onclick,scope:this},"->",this.addBtn,"-",this.modBtn,"-",this.delBtn,"-",this.sumBtn,"-",this.btns],bbar:Ext.fjs.PageToolBar({store:this.store})});this.getSelectionModel().on("selectionchange",this.evt_selection,this);this.on("rowdblclick",this.mod_onclick,this)},evt_selection:function(sm){var bts=this.btns.menu.items,len=sm.getCount();if(len==1){this.modBtn.enable();this.delBtn.enable()}else{this.modBtn.disable();this.delBtn.disable()}},getSid:function(){return Ext.fjs.getPKId(this,"SID")},refresh:function(){this.getBottomToolbar().doRefresh()},search_onclick:function(){var s=this.store,startTime=this.fstarttime.getValue(),endTime=this.fendtime.getValue();if(startTime!=0&&endTime!=0){if(startTime>endTime){Ext.fjs.showInfo("开始时间不能大于结束时间!");return}};s.setBaseParam("TID",this.ftype.getValue());s.setBaseParam("STARTTIME",startTime);s.setBaseParam("ENDTIME",endTime);s.load({params:{start:0,limit:this.getBottomToolbar().pageSize}})},add_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.addWin;if(!w){this.addWin=w=new Ext.coo.popular.channel.addWindow(this)};w.open()},mod_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.modWin;if(!w){this.modWin=w=new Ext.coo.popular.channel.modWindow(this)};w.open(this.getSid())},del_onclick:function(){Ext.msg.confirm(Ext.fjs.NOTICE,Ext.fjs.del_confirm,this.delConfirm,this)},delConfirm:function(btn){if(btn=="yes"){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:{action:"delete",ids:this.getSid()},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})}},send_onclick:function(btn){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.coo.popular.channel.g_url,params:{action:"send",ids:this.getSid()},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})},sum_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.sumWin;if(!w){this.sumWin=w=new Ext.coo.popular.channel.sumWindow(this)};w.open()},apply_success:function(res,opts){var rs=Ext.decode(res.responseText);if(rs.success){Ext.fjs.showInfo(rs.message);this.refresh()}else{Ext.fjs.showError(rs.message)}},export_onclick:function(btn){Ext.fjs.showInfo("导出功能暂未开放!")},beforeDestroy:function(){if(this.addWin)Ext.destroy(this.addWin);if(this.modWin)Ext.destroy(this.modWin);if(this.extWin)Ext.destroy(this.extWin);Ext.coo.popular.channel.MainPanel.superclass.beforeDestroy.call(this)}});
